entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
